}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Arcadyan|Orange}}
===Specifications=== * [[Orange Livebox Next 2.2]] (2015, FTTH/ADSL) • [[Arcadyan]] (VRV9510KWAC23) : WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac, 2.4GHz 300Mbps/5GHz 1300Mbps • [https://www.redeszone.net/analisis/routers/livebox-next/ Livebox Next] :• CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80920 (VRX288) @500MHz (VDSL2) :• Flash: Zentel A5U1GA31ATS-8G (128MB) :• RAM: 2x Nanya NT5TU128M8HE-AC (256MB) :• Wireless 2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM43222 2T2R (300Mbps) :: PAM/FEM: 2x chips (QH1 6656 319); PSU: 12V/2.5A :• Wireless 5GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM4360 3T3R (1300Mbps) :: PAM/FEM: 3x [[Skyworks]] SKY85703-11 (SKY11 85703 418UG) :• ADSL: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80190 (XWAY VRX208) ADSL/VDSL2 :• VoIP: [[Lantiq]] PEF 42068 V (XWAY SLIC120) 2x SCL :• Ethernet: 3x [[Lantiq]] PEF7071V Gigabit Ethernet
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/arcadyan/astoria/arcadyan_astoria_vrv9510kwac23 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/vrv9510kwac23 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/arcadyan-vrv9510kwac-livebox-next-development-discussion |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_5ghz wifi 5ghz] |comment = }} [https://openwrt.org/_media/media/arcadyan/vrv9510/board2.jpg PCB]
